feed.title: Graftroot: Private and efficient surrogate scripts under the taproot assumption

entry.title: Graftroot: Private and efficient surrogate scripts under the taproot assumption
entry.summary: A suggestion was made by Jeremy on February 9, 2018 at 7:29 AM, about improving the utility of a construction. He stated that if functionality is introduced that makes a script invalid after a certain time, it could enhance its usefulness. The thread was tagged with "nExpiryTime" for future reference and searching archives for more information is recommended.
